requirement_description: Returns text merged into a single ticket_text string
Shows meaningful errors for: Missing permissions, Invalid URL, Bad token
The system generates an RTM after a test plan is created.
Each RTM entry includes Requirement ID.
Each RTM entry includes Requirement description.
Each RTM entry includes Associated test case ID(s).
Each RTM entry includes Coverage status (Covered / Not Covered).
Every requirement appears exactly once in the RTM.
The RTM is derived directly from the test plan and does not require additional user input.
If a requirement is not covered by any test, this condition is clearly identified.
RTM generation does not block test plan creation.
